name: Serverless E-Commerce Platform
description: A highly scalable serverless e-commerce architecture using AWS services

components.name: Amazon API Gateway
components.description: RESTful API endpoint management with caching and throttling

components.name: AWS Lambda
components.description: Serverless compute for business logic processing

components.name: Amazon DynamoDB
components.description: NoSQL database for product catalog and user data

components.name: Amazon S3
components.description: Object storage for product images and static assets

components.name: Amazon CloudFront
components.description: Content delivery network for global distribution

relationships.description: API Gateway routes HTTP requests to Lambda functions
Lambda functions perform CRUD operations on DynamoDB
Lambda functions upload/download files to/from S3
API Gateway uses Cognito for user authentication
CloudFront caches static content from S3
CloudFront routes dynamic requests to API Gateway

patterns.name: Serverless Architecture
patterns.description: Fully managed compute with automatic scaling

patterns.name: Microservices Pattern
patterns.description: Modular service design with independent scaling

requirements: Sub-second response times for API calls
PCI DSS compliance for payment processing
constraints: Cognito user pool limit: 50 million users
bestPractices: Use Lambda layers for shared dependencies
Enable DynamoDB auto-scaling with proper alarms
Implement proper IAM roles with least privilege
Use API Gateway caching for frequent GET requests
Enable S3 versioning and lifecycle policies
Implement proper error handling and retries
Use CloudFront with proper cache invalidation strategies
Monitor all services with CloudWatch alarms
Use AWS X-Ray for distributed tracing
